MAIN.PROFESSIONAL_PROFILE_TEXT: Multiplatform web developer with practical experience in Angular, NestJS and other web tools. Participation in international projects oriented to SaaS solutions and web platforms. Technical knowledge in JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, SQL and libraries such as Three.js, GSAP, ORMs for databases, etc. Special attention to detail, oral and written communication skills in English and Spanish, and solid self-management.

MAIN.EXPERIENCE_BULLET_2: Participation in all phases of the development cycle: planning, coding, testing, delivery and post-launch support.
MAIN.EXPERIENCE_BULLET_3: Direct communication with European clients and multidisciplinary remote work.
